body.name: Evenflo Feeding Classic Glass Bottle, Twist Bottles, 8 Oz, 1-Pack of 6 Bottles
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 24 mins
features: Mother Nature approved - being environmentally kind is important to all of us which is why the Evenflo tempered glass baby bottle is recyclable, sustainable and safe for the environment.

Easy to hold - Evenflo classic and iconic shape now has a fun, ergonomic twist These uniquely shaped glass baby bottles are incredibly easy to hold while feeding, ensuring both you and your little one are comfortable.
Easy to clean - Designed with only 3 pieces, The classic glass baby bottles can be easily assembled and disassembled for a quick, thorough cleaning between feedings.

Pump directly into your baby bottles - breastfeeding and pumping can be a time consuming task and as a mother you have things to do. Pumping directly into your glass baby bottles is convenient and our bottles will fit onto most standard neck breast pumps.
Bpa Free - you're committed to your child's safety and so is Evenflo. Their baby bottles are constructed of food grade materials.
body.description: With a new twist on an iconic classic, Evenflo feeding's glass Bottle offers style on top of superior sanitizing, recycling, and sustainability. The tempered glass Bottle includes a classic slow flow soft silicone nipple with micro air vents to help prevent nipple collapse.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Evenflo Feeding Classic Glass Twist Bottles Features Micro Air Vents help prevent nipple collapse An iconic classic with an ergonomic, easy-to-hold twist! Pump directly into glass bottles - standard neck size What's Included? Size: 4 fl. oz and 8 fl. oz.Assortment: 4 fl. oz. available in 1 pack, 3 pack and 6 pack; 8 fl. oz. available in 1 pack, 3 pack and 6 pack.Color: ClearCompatibility: Proflo + Vented Nipples, Classic Nipples, All Evenflo Standard Neck Bottles Product Description By providing a complete line of feeding solutions for your baby's changing needs, Evenflo continues to deliver a twist on an iconic classic. Featuring classic styling with an ergonomic shape, these bottles are easy to clean and assemble as well as easy to hold. Made with tempered glass, Evenflo Classic Glass Bottles are also designed with safety in mind. This Mother Nature approved bottle comes with Evenflo’s Classic Slow Flow soft silicone nipples. These soft silicone nipples are equipped with Micro Air Vents that prevent nipple collapse and promote a more comfortable feeding experience. To help take the guesswork out of feeding your little one the Evenflo Classic Glass Bottles feature molded measurement markers in both ounces and milliliters to provide an easy and accurate way to measure the volume of liquids without the risk of the measurements washing off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice bottles, but leak like crazy
reviews.reviewText: We had a set of the glass bottles in the 4oz size and our baby started eating more so we were gifted this set. I was happy to get a new set of bottle rings because ours had seen better days, but the new ones leak constantly. You have to put the nipple on SO TIGHT if you don’t want milk just running out under the ring. Then the nipple is on too tight to get any ventilation and collapses. There’s a fine line you need to find between leaking and venting, and it’s so hard to locate. Very frustrating during night feeds. Other than that, love the glass bottles!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2018
